item.title: Best PDF Compression Settings for 2025 - Expert Recommendations
item.dc:creator: AltafToolsHub Team
item.description: Discover the optimal PDF compression settings for different use cases in 2025. From email attachments to web publishing, we cover all scenarios.
item.content:encoded:
Choosing the right compression settings can make a huge difference in your final PDF quality and size. Here are our expert recommendations for 2025.

Compression Settings by Use Case

For Email (Target: 100-200KB)

Use high compression with our tool's email-optimized preset. Perfect for documents under 10 pages.

For Web Publishing (Target: 500KB-1MB)

Balance quality and size with medium compression. Ensures fast loading without sacrificing readability.

For Archival (Target: 2-5MB)

Use light compression to preserve maximum quality while still reducing file size by 30-50%.
